    • Uses of Options.Builder in com.ooyala.android.configuration

      Methods in com.ooyala.android.configuration that return Options.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Options.Builder Options.Builder.enableHevc(boolean hevcEnabled)
      If true, the player will try to play the video using HEVC if the device is capable of playing it.
      Options.Builder Options.Builder.setBypassPCodeMatching(boolean bypassPCodeMatching)
      Set bypass PCode matching
      Options.Builder Options.Builder.setConnectionTimeout(int connectionTimeoutInMillisecond)
      Set the connection timeout value used by networking operations.
      Options.Builder Options.Builder.setDisableVASTOoyalaAds(boolean disableVASTOoyalaAds)
      Set disable VAST and Ooyala ads.
      Options.Builder Options.Builder.setDynamicFilters(java.util.List<java.lang.String> dynamicFilters)
      Set the dynamic filters to be sent to Azure.
      Options.Builder Options.Builder.setExoConfiguration(ExoConfiguration exoConfig)
      Set the ExoPlayer configuration.
      Options.Builder Options.Builder.setInitialPlaybackSpeed(float initialPlaybackSpeed)
      Set the initial playback speed.
      Options.Builder Options.Builder.setIqConfiguration(com.ooyala.android.analytics.IqConfiguration iqConfiguration) 
      Options.Builder Options.Builder.setPlayerInfo(PlayerInfo playerInfo)
      Set the player info to be communicated to the cloud.

      Set preload content

      Options.Builder Options.Builder.setReadTimeout(int readTimeoutInMillisecond)
      Set the stream read timeout value used by networking operations.

      Set show ads controls

      Set show cue points

      Set show live controls

      Set show promotion image
      Options.Builder Options.Builder.setTVRatingConfiguration(FCCTVRatingConfiguration tvRatingConfiguration)
      Set the TV Rating configuration.
      Options.Builder Options.Builder.setUseAdobePlayer(boolean useAdobePlayer)
